install extension "shortcut menu bar"
(https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=jerrygoyal.shortcut-menu-bar)

add custom buttons (01 and 02) with command:

01: workbench.action.tasks.runTask | vt_build
02: workbench.action.tasks.runTask | vt_run_jve

optionally replace icons with icons in this folder (follow guide in extionion description)
